DESCRIPTION: There are two major versions of the PCRE library. The newest version is PCRE2, which is a re-working of the original PCRE library to provide an entirely new API. The original, very widely deployed PCRE library's API and feature are stable, future releases  will be for bugfixes only. All new future features will be to PCRE2, not the original PCRE 8.x series.
SUMMARY:
Perl Compatible Regular Expressions version 2
grep utility that uses perl 5 compatible regexes
grep utility that uses perl 5 compatible regexes - docs
program for testing Perl-comatible regular expressions
program for testing Perl-comatible regular expressions - docs
PACKAGES: libpcre2-16 libpcre2-32 pcre2grep pcre2grep-doc pcre2test pcre2test-doc
